name: Tales of Eldraza
description:
Tales of Eldraza is a fantasy game set in a world with scattered floating landmasses and dwindling resources. In this harsh disjointed world, it is the job of the Couriers to keep everyone connected. As a Courier, you must deliver packages and people, while defending your cargo from pirates.

README

--------------------------------

Airship controls:

enter/exit the ship - [At the moment it says press E to enter the steering wheel. THIS IS WRONG. PRESS RMB]

Forward - W

Backward - S

Turn Right-  D

Turn Left - A

Up - R

Down - F

-------------------------

Player Controls:

move -WSAD

look - mouseXY

talk - E

enter airship or cannon - RMB
